ðŸ§¬ Biography
A passionate researcher with strong foundations in AI, deep learning, and medical imaging, I enjoy applying interpretable models to real-world clinical data. I have experience working with CNNs, Vision Transformers (ViT), and explainability tools like SHAP and Grad-CAM.
Previously, I served as a Research Assistant at UTM CAIRO, contributing to AI modeling and data analytics for semiconductor projects. I also have experience teaching undergraduate programming and data analytics.
